content: lion brand pattern # 70207a skill level beginner level 1 vanna s choice® article #860 12 colors 1 ball each *rust chocolate brick mustard taupe antique rose purple dusty blue olive pea green dusty rose dusty purple* gauge 14 double_crochet + 8 row = 5 in 12 5 cm afghan is worked in double_crochet following color sequence crochet border to finish also available at michaels on lionbrand com 1 similar stripe throws in vanna s choice l10509 stripey crocheted throw 2 4 colors 40 x 40 in 101 5 x 101 5 cm 70805ad stripes blanket 3 7 colors 40 x 61 in 101 5 x 155 cm 1 http //michaels lionbrand com/patterns/70207a html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/stripey-crocheted-throw 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/stripes-blanket-70805ad
